content:
I've been looking into wasmtime for a hobby project, and I've noticed that a 0.15.0 release got published ~4 hours ago, skipping 0.14, while everything I can see in the repo claims it's still unreleased. (i.e. no release notes)

I just wanted to check that nothing weird is going on here.
i think that dan just didnt get to writing up the notes yet

he had to do a lot of engineering of the release scripts to get this release out the door, it was originally intended to be 0.13, then some fixes to that were made as 0.14, and finally it went out as 0.15.
aha. That makes sense. I'll wait for the proper notes, then.
this is the first release of wasmtime since merging cranelift into the same repository, plus a handful of other things were introduced, so it was not really a typical release
